paragraphs.name: 2c29
paragraphs.text: She has cracks in her walls that I fill, just as she fills cracks in mine. So if there is ever any perfection about us, it will be because we have each other, reinforce each other and support each other.

paragraphs.name: d111
paragraphs.text: This is where I belong.

paragraphs.name: 2f7b
paragraphs.text: She has been through her own hell and she wears the burn marks so well that it would be inappropriate to call them scars. Mementos, maybe, but not scars.

paragraphs.name: a416
paragraphs.text: She adds fuel to the will to be better, to become an improved version of myself, to grow in multiple directions.

paragraphs.name: 1dac
paragraphs.text: There is a real live person who wants me for a lifetime, someone I can be alone with and not feel crowded. What fantasy can compare?

85ac564b5b71.title: Sounds like an amazing person you’ve described so beautifully!

paragraphs.text: Sounds like an amazing person you’ve described so beautifully!

paragraphs.text: Beautiful!

paragraphs.text: I Told My Mother About You
paragraphs.name: 7dd9

paragraphs.text: I met someone.
paragraphs.name: 127f

paragraphs.text: She has kind eyes and a soft heart, an easy smile and a subtle feistiness about her.
paragraphs.name: b46f

paragraphs.text: She laughs like laughter is air and she cannot get enough of it.
paragraphs.name: 810f

9447d080b41.title: Finally, someone who understands the feeling ❤

paragraphs.text: Her head is about as high as my chest but I look up to her. You know there is a tallness that has nothing to do with height.

When you wrote about filling the cracks in each other’s walls, I thought of this:

paragraphs.text:
When you wrote about filling the cracks in each other’s walls, I thought of this:
“Kintsugi (“golden joinery”) or kintsukuroi (“goldenrepair”) is the centuries-old Japanese art of fixing broken pottery with a special lacquer dusted with powdered gold, silver, or platinum. Beautiful seams of gold glint in the cracks of ceramic ware, giving a unique…
